description: Dave wasn't sure if he was gonna be here because his friend who talked him into doing this shoot and was scheduled to also perform, chickened out at the last moment. But Dave showed up and unlike his absent buddy, he is no quitter - he made up his mind to to this. It's not like he's never been naked in front of other people before?! Dave has a handsome angelic face crowned with a mass of dark curly hair. He is relatively smooth with a dark treasure trail tracking down his belly to a really nice dick. Like the biblical David, this noble prince ably plays on his harp, strumming his instrument with nimble fingers to a chorus of silent hallelujahs and heavy breathing. He is a fierce warrior in this performance and generously rewards his adoring audience with a smattering of his seed. Amen.
title: Dave, Scene #01
